item.title: About
item.description: My name is Pat Browne. I like to build things, and to understand how they work. This blog is one of the places where I do that. I’m currently studying computer science and statistics at Boston University. Specific areas that I am interested in include compilers and operating systems, cryptography, machine learning/AI, probability, financial markets, and number theory. You can email me at pjbrowne011 [at] gmail [dot] com.
